column3: Description
Contextually relevant information not possible to represent through other core concepts
column14: Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Javier Fernandez, Axel Polleres, Elmar Kiesling, Fajar Ekaputra, Simon Steyskal

column3: An indication of 'importance' within a context
column9: Importance can be used to express importance, desirability, relevance, or significance as a context.
column14: Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Paul Ryan, Georg P Krog, Julian Flake, Beatriz Esteves

column3: Indication of 'primary' or 'main' or 'core' importance
column14: Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Paul Ryan, Georg P Krog, Julian Flake, Beatriz Esteves

column3: Indication of 'secondary' or 'minor' or 'auxiliary' importance
column14: Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Paul Ryan, Georg P Krog, Julian Flake, Beatriz Esteves

column3: An indication of 'necessity' within a context
column9: Necessity can be used to express need, essentiality, requirement, or compulsion.
column14: Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Paul Ryan, Georg P Krog, Julian Flake, Beatriz Esteves

column3: Indication of 'required' or 'necessary'
column14: Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Paul Ryan, Georg P Krog, Julian Flake, Beatriz Esteves

column3: Indication of 'optional' or 'voluntary'
column14: Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Paul Ryan, Georg P Krog, Julian Flake, Beatriz Esteves

column3: Indication of neither being required nor optional i.e. not relevant or needed
column14: Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Paul Ryan, Georg P Krog, Julian Flake, Beatriz Esteves

column3: The technology, technological implementation, or any techniques, skills, methods, and processes used or applied
column9: Examples (non-exhaustive) include: Algorithm, Process, Method, Skill, Database, Cookies, Server, Device

column3: Indication of the extent or range or boundaries associated with(in) a context
The frequency or information about periods and repetitions in terms of recurrence.
Frequency where occurences are continous
Frequency where occurences are often or frequent, but not continous
Frequency where occurences are sporadic or infrequent or sparse
Frequency where occurences are singular i.e. they take place only once
The duration or temporal limitation
Duration that is open ended or without an end
Duration that has a fixed temporal duration e.g. 6 months
Duration that takes place until a specific event occurs e.g. Account Closure
Duration that has a fixed end date e.g. 2022-12-31
Duration that takes place a fixed number of times e.g. 3 times
A form of documentation providing reaosns, explanations, or justifications
